inclusion.criterion: History of cough and/or shortness of breath
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Increased respiratory rate ( ≥ 50/min if ≤12 months old, ≥ 40/min)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chest retractions, cyanosis, saturation< 92% on air, poor feeding or lethargy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documented fever (axillary /central temp ≥ 38/38.5°C) within 24 hrs of admission
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Abnormal CXR with presence of alveolar infiltrates
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Responds to IV antibiotics by the first 72 hrs and able to go home with oral antibiotics
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Children who (a) are transferred from another hospital
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo Controlled Trial Children aged 3 months till <5 years old
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 25-year-old pregnant woman with fever and chills. She has a history of dysuria, urgency, and frequency. Her urine culture showed Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells.
